newsitem.title: UK: AEI starts Northern Ireland operation.
newsitem.headline: AEI starts Northern Ireland operation.

text.p: Air Express International Corp said it has setup AEI (Northern Ireland) Ltd following major investments in the province by foreign investors.
The new Belfast-based operation is headed by Paul Murray, while Helen McCormack is operations manager and Paul Nelson is imports manager, AEI said in a statement.
AEI (Northern Ireland) has a 300 square metre warehouse and office facility in the cargo building at Belfast International airport.

"There is a great deal of global awareness of the business opprtunities in Northern Ireland and a confidence that we can continue to attract investment from other parts of Europe, the U.S. and the Pacific," Murray said.
"We are already working with pharmaceuticals, telecommunications, aircraft components and high tech manufacturers here," he added.
AEI is also looking for potential locations for a warehousing and distribution centre Northern Ireland, the statement said.
